entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 5.
